OrgName.entry: THERAPY SERVICES, SHEFFIELD HEALTH AND SOCIAL CARE NHS FOUNDATION TRUST

Desc.entry: Provides occupational therapy, art therapy, music therapy and integrated complementary therapy. For people with mental health problems (child and adolescent, adult and older adults), people with learning disabilities, older people, people with physical disabilities, and community rehabilitation.

DisabledAccess.entry: Some parts of the building have wheelchair access and disabled toilet, please contact for details
